name: Gecko Jumper
description:
Climb the tree and eat the fruit.
Arrow keys or WASD for movement and space for jumping.

This game was built using Godot 4 and was originally meant for the Ludum Dare Jam in the fall, but build issues with Godot 4 meant we couldn't publish.

Thanks to the awesome help from the following:
MrGeko: Character art
kreksyte: Tile art and backgrounds
OceanBoi612: Lead and coding
